Title: HHChat
Description: A client-server chat program allowing users to have a list of contacts with whom they can chat either individually or in groups.  Will support sending files and emoticons.  Developed in C# using WPF, MVVM and WCF.
HomeWiki:
HHChat

A client-server chat program that will give users the ability to create a list of contacts with whom they can can, either individually or in a group. Users will be able to send files to each other and send emoticons.

The program will be written in C# and use WPF with MVVM and WCF for the server architecture.
